nodes.text: Patrick LoBrutto, or Pat LoBrutto, has been an editor, author and anthologist for over 30 years. His career in publishing began while in Graduate School for Urban Planning; he took a summer job in the mailroom of Ace Books and discovered there were people who would pay him to read.

He currently lectures at writer's conferences and works as an Editorial Consultant and Master Class Instructor for authors, an Acquiring Editor for Tor/Forge and Quill Driver Books/Word Dancer Press and as a scout for the Trident Media Group.
